text: Nick Mourouzis (April 16, 1937 – September 16, 2020) was an American football player and coach. He was the head football coach at DePauw University in Greencastle, Indiana from 1981 to 2003. He had a winning record of 133–82–4. As a college football player, Mourouzis was a starting quarterback at Miami University in Oxford, Ohio. Mourouzis was born in New Philadelphia, Ohio. Mourouzis died on September 16, 2020 from COVID-19 in Greencastle, Indiana at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Sportspeople from Ohio Category:Sportspeople from Indiana
title: Nick Mourouzis
